name: disjimin

body.origin:
|- wi(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(cin(c1, c0)))
-| wss(cin(c1, c0), c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(cin(c1, c0)))
-| wss(cin(c1, c0), c0)

comment: Disjointness condition for intersection. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 11-Jun-2021.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 28-Sep-2021.)
